actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To encourage the Secretary of the Army to support the implementation of hybrid-electric engine technology within the High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle fleet, and for other purposes.

summary.text: This bill expresses the sense of Congress that the Department of the Army should support the implementation of hybrid-electric engine technology within its High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle fleet.

titles.title: To encourage the Secretary of the Army to support the implementation of hybrid-electric engine technology within the High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle fleet, and for other purposes.
